AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget_user2

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BudgetLines(selected Budget)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Account(Nonexpense)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Dept Lookup
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_lookup_type_id in ( select efin_lookup_type_id from efin_lookup_type where reference ='DEPT') and (enddate is null or enddate::date >= now()::date)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_Account_List
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when (@EM_Efin_Bank_Branch_ID@ is null and @EM_Efin_Bank_ID@ is not null) then Efin_Account.Efin_Account_ID in (select efin_account_id from efin_account where efin_bank_id = @EM_Efin_Bank_ID@ or efin_bank_branch_id = (select efin_bank_branch_id from efin_bank_branch where efin_bank_id = @EM_Efin_Bank_ID@)) when (@EM_Efin_Bank_Branch_ID@ is not null and @EM_Efin_Bank_ID@ is not null) then Efin_Account.Efin_Account_ID in (select efin_account_id from efin_account where efin_bank_branch_id = @EM_Efin_Bank_Branch_ID@) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Listing * Organization
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id='0'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_ToAccount_No
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.c_elementvalue_id in(select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getchildacct(@C_Elementvalue_ID@),',')::character varying [] ) ,'''','')) and C_Elementvalue.ad_client_id = @#ad_client_id@ and C_Elementvalue.issummary = 'N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget based on account
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='E' and c_campaign_id in ( select budget.c_campaign_id from c_campaign budget join EFIN_BudgetType_Acct parentacc on budget.c_campaign_id = parentacc.c_campaign_id join ad_treenode treenode on parentacc.C_ElementValue_id = treenode.parent_id where treenode.node_id = @Account_ID@ ) )or(@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='A' and c_campaign_id = (select c_campaign_id from c_campaign where em_efin_iscarryforward ='N' and ad_client_id =@ad_client_id@ limit 1) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_RdvTxn_List
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.Value in ( select transactiontype from efin_rdv_types where maintain_enable_txntype = 'Y' and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_RDV_Receipt
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: 1=1 and (((@TXN_Type@ = 'POD' and m_inout_id in (select m_inout_id from m_inout where em_escm_receivingtype in ('IR','SR') and em_escm_iscustody_transfer='N' and em_escm_docstatus = 'CO' and c_doctype_id not in (select c_doctype_id from c_doctype where em_escm_isporeceipt = 'Y' and ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@) and movementdate <= (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@TXN_Date@))) ) or(@TXN_Type@ = 'POS' and (m_inout_id not in (select m_inout_id from m_inout where c_order_id in ( select c_order_id from c_order where em_escm_base_order in ( select coalesce(ord.em_escm_base_order,rdv.c_order_id) from efin_rdv rdv join c_order ord on ord.c_order_id = rdv.c_order_id where rdv.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and rdv.c_order_id is not null and txn_type='PO' ) or ( c_order_id in ( select coalesce(ord.em_escm_base_order,rdv.c_order_id) from efin_rdv rdv join c_order ord on ord.c_order_id = rdv.c_order_id where rdv.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and rdv.c_order_id is not null and txn_type='PO' )) ) ) and ( m_inout_id in (select m_inout_id from m_inout po join c_order od on od.c_order_id = po.c_order_id and od.c_order_id is not null where em_escm_receivingtype in ('IR','SR','PROJ') and em_escm_docstatus = 'CO' and od.em_efin_budget_manencum_id is not null and po.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and po.c_doctype_id in (select c_doctype_id from c_doctype where em_escm_isporeceipt = 'Y' and ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@) and movementdate <= (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@TXN_Date@))) ) )) ) and m_inout_id not in (select m_inout_id from efin_rdv where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and m_inout_id is not null) and m_inout_id not in (select m_inout_id from m_inout where c_order_id in ( select coalesce(em_efin_c_order_id,'') from c_invoice where em_efin_invoicetype_txt='POM' and ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and docstatus <> 'EFIN_CA' ) and c_order_id is not null )) or m_inout_id = @M_Inout_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_budget_encum_status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('APP','INAPP','CO')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Bpartner_SecurityRule
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bpartner.c_bpartner_id in(select bp.c_bpartner_id from efin_security_rules_bp bp join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=bp.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BudgetPrearationAcct
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.C_Elementvalue_ID in (select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getchildacct ((select C_Elementvalue_ID from efin_budget_preparation bug where bug.efin_budget_preparation_id=@EFIN_BUDGET_PREPARATION_ID@)) ,',')::character varying [] ) ,'''','')) and C_Elementvalue.elementlevel='S' and C_Elementvalue.IsActive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BudgetAdd_BudtypeLine
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Campaign_ID = (select C_Campaign_ID from Efin_Budgetadd where Efin_Budget_ID = @Efin_Budget_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Security_Rules_Budtype
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID in (select bud.c_campaign_id from Efin_Security_Rules_Budtype bud join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=bud.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@)) and ((@encum_type_text@<>'AAE') or (@encum_type_text@='AAE' and C_Campaign.em_efin_budgettype ='F'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Chapter_3and4
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value IN ('3','4')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_TOSubAccount_BasedonChapter
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.c_elementvalue_id in(select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getchildacct(@C_Elementvalue_ID@) ,',')::character varying [] ) ,'''','')) and C_Elementvalue.ad_client_id = @#ad_client_id@ and C_Elementvalue.elementlevel = 'S' and case when @from_c_project@ != '' then C_Elementvalue.value >= (select value from c_elementvalue where c_elementvalue_id = @from_c_project@) else 1=1 end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Service item in invoiceline
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (efin_lookup_type_id in ( select efin_lookup_type_id from efin_lookup_type where reference ='SITEM') and case when (select serviceitemsecurity from efin_sadadbill_config where ad_client_id = @ad_client_id@) = 'Y' then efin_lookup_line_id in ( select serviceitem from efin_serviceitem_config where c_elementvalue_id = @EM_Efin_Elementvalue_ID@ and applicationtype = @EM_Efin_Applicationtype@ and dept_auth_code = @EM_Efin_Deptauthcode@ and dept_benefit_code = @EM_Efin_Deptbenefitcode@ and isActive = 'Y' and( enddate is null or enddate::date >= now()::date)) else efin_lookup_line_id in ( select efin_lookup_line_id from efin_lookup_line where isActive = 'Y' ) end) and (enddate is null or enddate::date >= now()::date)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRuleFuture1
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: User1.User1_ID not in ( select user1_id from Efin_Security_Rules_Fut1 a join Efin_Security_Rules b on b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID join Efin_Security_Rulesfuture1 c on c.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID where a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@ and c.type=@Type@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_gl_journalline_status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('SCS','ERR')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRuleFuture2
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: User2.User2_ID not in ( select user2_id from Efin_Security_Rules_Fut2 a join Efin_Security_Rules b on b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID join Efin_Security_Rulesfuture2 c on c.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID where a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@ and c.type=@Type@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_chapter3&4
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.C_Elementvalue_ID in(select line.C_Elementvalue_ID from efin_budgettype_acct line join C_Campaign on C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID= line.C_Campaign_ID left join C_Acctschema_element ase on ase.C_Acctschema_id = C_Campaign.em_efin_c_acctschema_id and ase.elementtype='AC' where C_Campaign.EM_Efin_Budgettype = 'C' and ase.isactive='Y') and C_Elementvalue.issummary='Y' and C_Elementvalue.value in ('3','4')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_PILines_BPartner
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when (select em_efin_istax from c_invoice where c_invoice_id =@C_INVOICE_ID@) = 'N' then c_bpartner.c_bpartner_id not in( select c_bpartner_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id =@C_INVOICE_ID@) else true end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Org_SecurityRule
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @Encum_Type@ = 'TE' then ad_org_id = '0' else AD_Org_ID in (select org.ad_org_id from ad_org org join ehcm_org_type typ on typ.ehcm_org_type_id = org.em_ehcm_orgtyp and typ.value ='ORG' and typ.ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@ ) and AD_Org_ID <> '0' end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_PeriodValidation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter Period for specific Financial Year
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Period.C_Year_ID =@C_Year_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_FundsReq_TransactionOrg
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Org_ID in ( select ad_org_id from ad_role_orgaccess where ad_role_id = @#AD_Role_ID@ and isactive='Y' ) and AD_Org_ID in (SELECT o.ad_org_id FROM ad_org o JOIN ad_orgtype ot ON o.ad_orgtype_id=ot.ad_orgtype_id WHERE isready ='Y' AND istransactionsallowed='Y' OR o.ad_org_id='0')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Finance_Supplier
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: isvendor='Y' and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Account type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select accounttype from c_elementvalue where c_elementvalue_id = @c_elementvalue_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Nodefault_Project
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_project.em_efin_isdefault='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Budget_Adjust(OrgValid)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id in (select ad_org_id from c_validcombination where c_salesregion_id = @EFIN_Aux_CostCenter@ and account_id = @AccountId@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Distribute Org in Header(Rev and adj)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_orgtype_id <>'0' and em_ehcm_orgtyp in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value ='ORG')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Session_Role
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_role_id =@#AD_Role_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_FundsReqToAccountVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EM_Efin_Uniquecode is not null and ((coalesce(@Fromaccount@,'') <>'' and (( c_validcombination_id in (select c_validcombination_id from c_validcombination where (account_id||'-'||c_project_id||'-'||c_campaign_id||'-'||c_bpartner_id||'-'||c_activity_id||'-'|| user1_id ||'-'|| user2_id) in (select account_id||'-'||c_project_id||'-'||c_campaign_id||'-'||c_bpartner_id||'-'||c_activity_id||'-'|| user1_id ||'-'|| user2_id from c_validcombination where c_validcombination_id =@Fromaccount@ ) and ((@Trxtype@='ORGR' and (( @REQ_Type@='DIST' and ad_org_id=@Transaction_Org@) or(@REQ_Type@='REL' and c_salesregion_id in (select hq_budgetcontrolunit from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id =@AD_Client_ID@)))) or (@Trxtype@='BCUR' and 1=1)) )) and (c_validcombination_id<> @Fromaccount@) )) or ( coalesce(@Fromaccount@,'')='' and (c_validcombination_id not in (select c_validcombination_id from c_validcombination where c_validcombination_id in (select fromaccount from efin_fundsreqline where fromaccount is not null and efin_fundsreq_id=@Efin_Fundsreq_ID@ ))) and ( c_validcombination_id in (select c_validcombination_id from c_validcombination where (account_id||'-'||c_project_id||'-'||c_campaign_id||'-'||c_bpartner_id||'-'||c_activity_id||'-'|| user1_id ||'-'|| user2_id) in (select account_id||'-'||c_project_id||'-'||c_campaign_id||'-'||c_bpartner_id||'-'||c_activity_id||'-'|| user1_id ||'-'|| user2_id from c_validcombination where c_validcombination_id in (select c_validcombination_id from c_validcombination where c_validcombination_id in (select fromaccount from efin_fundsreqline where fromaccount is not null and efin_fundsreq_id=@Efin_Fundsreq_ID@ ))) )))) and ((@REQ_Type@='DIST' and c_salesregion_id in (select budgetcontrol_costcenter from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id =@AD_Client_ID@)) or(@REQ_Type@='REL' and c_salesregion_id in (select hq_budgetcontrolunit from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id =@AD_Client_ID@))) and ((c_validcombination_id not in (select toaccount from efin_fundsreqline where toaccount is not null and efin_fundsreq_id=@Efin_Fundsreq_ID@ )) or (c_validcombination_id= @Toaccount@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Service Lookup
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_lookup_type_id in ( select efin_lookup_type_id from efin_lookup_type where reference ='SITEM') and (enddate is null or enddate::date >= now()::date)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Dep_Static_Value
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: value in ('DEP')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_PI_ManualEncum
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Manual Encumrbance Validation inPurchase Invoice.display only Completed and based on dimension selected
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: docstatus='CO' and case when @EM_Efin_Invoicetype_Txt@<>'POM' then ((@EM_Efin_Invoicetype_Txt@ ='PPA' and Encum_Method= @EM_Efin_Encumtype@) or (@EM_Efin_Invoicetype_Txt@ <>'PPA' and 1=1)) and Efin_Budgetint_ID = @EM_Efin_Budgetint_ID@ and (extract(year from dateacct) = extract(year from (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@DateInvoiced@) from dual)) or(extract(year from dateacct) = extract(year from (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@DateAcct@) from dual) ))) and ((efin_budget_manencum_id in (select enc.efin_budget_manencum_id from efin_budget_manencum enc left join efin_budget_manencumlines ln on ln.efin_budget_manencum_id = enc.efin_budget_manencum_id where ln.remaining_amount > 0 and encum_type = (( select case when (ty.em_efin_isprepayinv='Y') then 'AAE' else 'AEE' end from c_doctype ty where ty.c_doctype_id=@C_DocTypeTarget_ID@ limit 1) )) and 1=(select case when (ty.em_efin_isprepayinv='Y') or ((ty.em_efin_isprepayinvapp='N') and (ty.em_efin_isprepayinv='N')) then 1 else 0 end from c_doctype ty where ty.c_doctype_id=@C_DocTypeTarget_ID@ limit 1)) or ((efin_budget_manencum_id in (select distinct em_efin_manualencumbrance_id from c_invoice inv left join c_bpartner bp on bp.c_bpartner_id =inv.c_bpartner_id left join c_doctype ty on ty.c_doctype_id= inv.c_doctypetarget_id where ty.em_efin_isprepayinv='Y' and bp.c_bpartner_id=@C_BPartner_ID@ and inv.docstatus = 'CO' and inv.posted='Y') and 1=(select case when (ty.em_efin_isprepayinvapp='Y') then 1 else 0 end from c_doctype ty where ty.c_doctype_id=@C_DocTypeTarget_ID@ limit 1))) or (@EM_Efin_Encumtype@='A' and (efin_budget_manencum_id in (select enc.efin_budget_manencum_id from efin_budget_manencum enc where (encum_type =(select case when (ty.em_efin_isprepayinv='Y') then '' when (ty.em_efin_isprepayinvapp='Y') then '' else 'IE' end from c_doctype ty where ty.c_doctype_id=@C_DocTypeTarget_ID@ limit 1 ))))) or (efin_budget_manencum_id in (select em_efin_manualencumbrance_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id=@C_Invoice_ID@ ))) and ( c_bpartner_id =@C_BPartner_ID@ or c_bpartner_id is null ) and c_campaign_id in (select c_campaign_id from c_campaign where em_efin_budgettype = @EM_Efin_Budget_Type@) else efin_budget_manencum_id in (select efin_budget_manencum_id from efin_budget_manencum where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and Efin_Budgetint_ID = @EM_Efin_Budgetint_ID@ ) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BudgetActive(Approved)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Budget.Status='APP' and Efin_Budget.Isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_InvoiceList_G/L
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Invoice_ID in ( select c_invoice_id from c_invoice inv join c_doctype doc on inv.c_doctype_id = doc.c_doctype_id and EM_Efin_Isprepayinv='Y' and inv.DocStatus = 'CO' and inv.posted='Y' and inv.c_invoice_id not in (select efin_applied_invoice from Efin_Applied_Prepayment where isactive='Y') and inv.EM_Efin_Pre_Remainingamount > 0 )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_PUR_USER1
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: User1.User1_ID in (select fut.User1_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Fut1 fut join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=fut.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@)) and ( case when ( select ru.efin_processbutton from efin_security_rules ru where ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@))='Y' then ( User1.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ or User1.em_efin_isdefault='Y') else User1.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ end )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Rdv_HoldType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: eut_deflookups_type_id in (select eut_deflookups_type_id from eut_deflookups_type where value ='HOLD_TYPE' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Selected Period based on year
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: select eut_convertto_gregorian(split_part(@Trxdate@ ,'-',3 )||split_part(@Trxdate@ ,'-',2 )||split_part(@Trxdate@,'-',1) ) between startdate and enddate and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_HoldType_90
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Rdv_Hold_Types_ID in ( select efin_rdv_hold_types_id from efin_rdv_hold_types where deductiontype in ( select eut_deflookups_typeln_id from eut_deflookups_typeln where eut_deflookups_type_id in ( select eut_deflookups_type_id from eut_deflookups_type where value='HOLD_TYPE' and ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@) and value='90') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Department(Encum line)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Salesregion_ID = (select C_Salesregion_ID from Efin_Budget_Manencum where Efin_Budget_Manencum_ID = @Efin_Budget_Manencum_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_LineManager
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_User_ID in ( select ad_user_id from ad_user_roles ur join ad_role r on r.ad_role_id = ur.ad_role_id where em_escm_islinemanager = 'Y' ) and ad_user_id <> @AD_User_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_ChapterValidation_SubAccount
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.C_Elementvalue_ID in(select line.C_Elementvalue_ID from efin_budgettype_acct line join C_Campaign on C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID= line.C_Campaign_ID left join C_Acctschema_element ase on ase.C_Acctschema_id = C_Campaign.em_efin_c_acctschema_id and ase.elementtype='AC' where C_Campaign.EM_Efin_Budgettype = 'C' and ase.isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Salesregion_Under_*Org
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_salesregion.ad_org_id in ('0')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_BP_bankAccountVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bpartner_id = (case when @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ else @C_Bpartner_ID@ end )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Active_user
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_User.IsActive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_ProposalAttrEncum_val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((docstatus = 'CO' and encum_type = 'PAE' and encum_method='M' and amount <> app_amt and efin_budgetint_id = @EM_Efin_Budgetinitial_ID@ and case when c_bpartner_id is not null then c_bpartner_id = @Suppliername@ else 1 = 1 end) or (Efin_Budget_Manencum_ID= @EM_Efin_Encumbrance_ID@ and c_bpartner_id = @Suppliername@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Listing Distibute Line Organization
Efin_Invoice_Ordertoreceive
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bpartner_id in(select c_bpartner_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id =@C_Invoice_ID@) and ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@ and em_efin_pre_remainingamount > 0 and Efin_C_Invoicepp_V_ID in (select c_invoice_id from c_invoice where posted='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Branch_City
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_city.c_city_id in (select c_city_id from c_city where c_country_id = @C_Country_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRuleEntity
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Securityactpick_V.Efin_Securityactpick_V_ID not in ( select c_bpartner_id from Efin_Security_Rules_Bp a join Efin_Security_Rules b on b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID join Efin_Security_Rulesbpartner c on c.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID where a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@ and c.type=@Type@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BudgetAcctGroup
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.C_Elementvalue_ID in(select line.C_Elementvalue_ID from efin_budgettype_acct line join C_Campaign on C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID= line.C_Campaign_ID left join C_Acctschema_element ase on ase.C_Acctschema_id = C_Campaign.em_efin_c_acctschema_id and ase.elementtype='AC' where C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID=@C_Campaign_ID@ and ase.isactive='Y') and C_Elementvalue.issummary='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Period for selected year

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Project validation

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_department_encumbrance
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ( C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID in (select dep.C_Salesregion_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Dept dep join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=dep.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@)) and C_Salesregion.isdefault='N' and ((@Encum_Type_text@ <> 'TE' and C_Salesregion.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@ and C_Salesregion.ad_org_id <> '0') or(@Encum_Type_text@ = 'TE' and @AD_Org_ID@ ='0')) )and (case when ('N'=(select coalesce(em_efin_govcostcentre, 'N') from c_salesregion where c_salesregion_id in(select c_salesregion_id from efin_user_manager where ad_user_id = @AD_User_Id@ and ad_client_id =@AD_Client_Id@ and document_type='ENC'))) then C_Salesregion.c_salesregion_id in(select c_salesregion_id from efin_user_manager where ad_user_id = @AD_User_Id@ and ad_client_id =@AD_Client_Id@ and document_type='ENC') else (C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID in(select dep.C_Salesregion_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Dept dep join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=dep.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@)) and C_Salesregion.isdefault='N' and ((@Encum_Type_text@ <> 'TE' and C_Salesregion.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@ and C_Salesregion.ad_org_id <> '0') or(@Encum_Type_text@ = 'TE' and @AD_Org_ID@ ='0')) ) end )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: UniqueCode in BR
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_BudgetLines.Efin_BudgetLines_id in ( select ln.Efin_BudgetLines_id from efin_budgetlines ln join efin_budget on efin_budget.efin_budget_id = ln.efin_budget_id where C_validcombination_ID =@C_Validcombination_ID@ and efin_budget.efin_budgetint_id = @Efin_Budgetint_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_G/LJournalLine_Account

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Validation for Expense and Non-Expense accounts Reports

AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: e.accounttype not in ('E')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Application Type

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Output Format
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value NOT IN ('html')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Account(Budget type)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.C_Elementvalue_ID in(select node_id from ad_treenode where parent_id in(select C_Elementvalue_ID from efin_budgettype_acct line join C_Campaign on C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID= line.C_Campaign_ID where C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID=@C_Campaign_ID@)) and C_Elementvalue.elementlevel='S'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget_BudgetType(G/L)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Campaign.EM_Efin_C_Acctschema_ID=@C_Acctschema_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Org_Static_Value

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Payment_Method_Hawala

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRule_Fut1Dimension
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: User1.User1_ID not in ( select User1_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Fut1 where Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_User2_SecurityRule
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: User2.User2_ID in (select fut.User2_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Fut2 fut join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=fut.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Department_SecurityRule
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID in (select dep.C_Salesregion_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Dept dep join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=dep.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@)) and C_Salesregion.isdefault='N' and C_Salesregion.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@ and case when @Encum_Type@ = 'TE' then C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID in (select hq_budgetcontrolunit from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@) else C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID not in ( select budgetcontrol_costcenter from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ ) and C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID not in ( select hq_budgetcontrolunit from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ ) end and (case when ('N'=(select coalesce(em_efin_govcostcentre, 'N') from c_salesregion where c_salesregion_id in(select c_salesregion_id from efin_user_manager where ad_user_id = @AD_User_Id@ and ad_client_id =@AD_Client_Id@ and document_type='API'))) then C_Salesregion.c_salesregion_id in(select c_salesregion_id from efin_user_manager where ad_user_id = @AD_User_Id@ and ad_client_id =@AD_Client_Id@ and document_type='API') else (C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID in (select dep.C_Salesregion_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Dept dep join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=dep.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@)) and C_Salesregion.isdefault='N' and C_Salesregion.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@ and case when @Encum_Type@ = 'TE' then C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID in (select hq_budgetcontrolunit from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@) else C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID not in ( select budgetcontrol_costcenter from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ ) and C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID not in ( select hq_budgetcontrolunit from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ ) end) end )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Department(Invoiceline)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID in (select dep.C_Salesregion_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Dept dep join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=dep.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@ and C_Salesregion.isdefault = 'N'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_PurInv_EncumType_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('M') AND ('Y'= ( select encmethod_manual from efin_enc_control where enc_type = @EM_Efin_Encum_Type@ and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@ ) )or (AD_Ref_List.value in ('A') AND ('Y'= ( select encmethod_auto from efin_enc_control where enc_type = @EM_Efin_Encum_Type@ and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@ ))) or( AD_Ref_List.value in ('N') and @EM_Efin_Invoicetype_Txt@ <>'PPI' and @EM_Efin_Invoicetype_Txt@ <>'PPA' )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRuleDepartment
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_securitydeptpick_v.efin_securitydeptpick_v_ID not in ( select c_salesregion_id from Efin_Security_Rules_Dept a join Efin_Security_Rules b on b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID join Efin_Security_Rulesdept c on c.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID where a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@ and c.type=@Type@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Inv_POM
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @EM_Efin_Invoicetype_Txt@='POM' then (escm_c_order_v_id in( select c_order_id from c_order where c_order.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and EM_Escm_Appstatus ='ESCM_AP' and issotrx='N' and (case when em_escm_secondsupplier is not null and em_escm_second_iban is not null then em_escm_secondsupplier = @C_BPartner_ID@ else C_BPartner_ID=@C_BPartner_ID@ end) and AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ and em_escm_revision = (select max(a.em_escm_revision) from c_order a where c_order.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and a.documentno = c_order.documentno and a.EM_Escm_Appstatus ='ESCM_AP') and coalesce(em_escm_advpaymnt_percntge,0)=0 ) and ((escm_c_order_v_id in (select ord.c_order_id from c_orderline join c_order ord on ord.c_order_id =c_orderline.c_order_id where c_orderline.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and em_escm_receivetype ='QTY' group by ord.c_order_id having sum(qtyordered) > sum(qtyinvoiced) )) or (escm_c_order_v_id in (select ord.c_order_id from c_orderline join c_order ord on ord.c_order_id =c_orderline.c_order_id where c_orderline.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and em_escm_receivetype ='AMT' group by ord.c_order_id having sum(linenetamt) > sum(em_efin_amtinvoiced) ))) and escm_c_order_v_id not in (select c_order_id from efin_rdv where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and c_order_id is not null)) else (escm_c_order_v_id in (select c_order_id from c_order where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and c_order_id is not null)) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Uniquecode_table
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EFIN_BudgetLines.EFIN_BudgetLines_ID in ( select ln.efin_budgetlines_id from efin_budgetlines ln join efin_budget bu on ln.efin_budget_id=bu.efin_budget_id where bu.c_year_id=@C_YEAR_ID@ and bu.c_campaign_id=@C_CAMPAIGN_ID@ and bu.isactive='Y' and bu.status='APP' and ln.isdistribution='N')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sales Region (Org) with 999 Dep
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='E' and (C_Salesregion.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ or C_Salesregion_id = (select budgetcontrol_costcenter from efin_budget_ctrl_param limit 1)) )or (@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='A' and (C_Salesregion.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_Prepayment_Invoice
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Invoice.C_Invoice_ID in (select inv.c_invoice_id from c_invoice inv join c_doctype doc on doc.c_doctype_id=inv.c_doctypetarget_id and doc.EM_Efin_Isprepayinv='Y' join c_bpartner bp on bp.c_bpartner_id =inv.c_bpartner_id and bp.c_bpartner_id=@C_BPartner_ID@ join efin_budget_manencum enc on enc.efin_budget_manencum_id=inv.em_efin_manualencumbrance_id and enc.efin_budget_manencum_id=@EM_Efin_Manualencumbrance_ID@ left join efin_applied_prepayment app on app.efin_applied_invoice=inv.c_invoice_id and app.efin_applied_prepayment_id not in (@Efin_Applied_Prepayment_ID@) where inv.em_efin_pre_remainingamount > 0 and outstandingamt=0 and posted ='Y' and inv.C_Currency_ID=@C_Currency_ID@ group by inv.c_invoice_id having coalesce(inv.grandtotal,0)>coalesce(sum(applied_amount),0) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Department benefit code validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_SalesRegion_ID not in (select HQ_Budgetcontrolunit from Efin_Budget_Ctrl_Param where ad_client_id = @#ad_client_id@) and C_SalesRegion_ID not in (select Budgetcontrol_Costcenter from Efin_Budget_Ctrl_Param where ad_client_id = @#ad_client_id@) and ad_org_id in (select ad_org_id from ad_org where ad_org_id = @ad_org_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Budg_Hold_RdvTxn
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_rdvtxn_id in (select efin_rdvtxn_id from efin_rdvtxn where efin_rdv_id in ( select efin_rdv_id from efin_rdv where c_order_id in ( select c_order_id from c_order where documentno=( select documentno from c_order where c_order_id=@C_Order_ID@) )) and txnver_status='DR' and appstatus='DR' and netmatch_amt>0)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_GLJournalLine_Project
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Project.C_Project_ID in (select bt.C_Project_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Proj bt join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=bt.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@) and bt.C_Project_ID in (select case when em_efin_projacct = 'Y' then (select case when em_efin_project_id is null then null else em_efin_project_id end from c_elementvalue where c_elementvalue_id =( select account_id from c_validcombination where c_validcombination_id= @C_ValidCombination_ID@)) else (select case when em_efin_project_id is not null then null else (select c_project_id from c_project where em_efin_isdefault = 'Y' and ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@) end from c_elementvalue where c_elementvalue_id =( select account_id from c_validcombination where c_validcombination_id= @C_ValidCombination_ID@)) end from c_elementvalue where c_elementvalue_id = ( select parent_id from ad_treenode where node_id = ( select account_id from c_validcombination where c_validcombination_id= @C_ValidCombination_ID@)) ))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Nonexpense(budgettype)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_campaign.c_campaign_id in (select c_campaign_id from c_campaign where em_efin_iscarryforward ='N')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Project_add
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Project_ID in (select pro.C_Project_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Proj pro join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=pro.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@)) and AD_Org_ID in (select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_parent_org(@AD_Org_ID@,@AD_Client_ID@),',')::character varying []),'''',''))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_FromAccount_No
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.c_elementvalue_id in(select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getchildacct(@C_Elementvalue_ID@),',')::character varying [] ) ,'''','')) and C_Elementvalue.ad_client_id = @#ad_client_id@ and C_Elementvalue.issummary = 'N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Enc_Type_Manual
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Value in (select enc_type from efin_enc_control where encmethod_manual = 'Y' and isactive = 'Y' and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@) or ( @Efin_Budget_Manencum_ID@ is not null and value=@Encum_Type@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: IBAN Address
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bpartner_location.c_bpartner_id = @C_BPartner_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_ProposalEncumbrance_val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((docstatus = 'CO' and encum_type = 'PAE' and encum_method='M' and amount <> app_amt and efin_budgetint_id = @EM_Efin_Budgetinitial_ID@ and case when c_bpartner_id is not null then c_bpartner_id = @Supplier@ else 1 = 1 end) or (Efin_Budget_Manencum_ID= @EM_Efin_Encumbrance_ID@ and c_bpartner_id = @Supplier@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_BudgetType_Security
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID in (select bt.C_Campaign_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Budtype bt join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=bt.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: activity
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Activity.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ or C_Activity.em_efin_isdefault='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_BP_BankAccount
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: bpartner =(case when @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ is null then @C_Bpartner_ID@ else @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ end ) and bank =@EM_Efin_Bank_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_AD_Org(legal with accounting)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ad_Org.Ad_OrgType_ID in ('0','1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_SalesRegion(Org)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Salesregion.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Listing Contract No
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_order.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and EM_Escm_Appstatus ='ESCM_AP' and issotrx='N' and em_escm_revision = (select max(a.em_escm_revision) from c_order a where c_order.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and a.documentno = c_order.documentno) and EM_Escm_Ordertype <> 'PUR_AG' and ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Budget_Adjustment_Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value='OBA'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Listing Prepayment Invoice
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Invoice.C_Invoice_ID in (select inv.c_invoice_id from c_invoice inv join c_doctype doc on doc.c_doctype_id=inv.c_doctypetarget_id and doc.EM_Efin_Isprepayinv='Y' and docstatus ='CO')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_EncumMethod_PR
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: value in (select case when encmethod_manual='Y' then 'M' when encmethod_auto='Y' then 'A' else 'A' end from efin_enc_control where enc_type ='PRE' and pr_type_list=@EM_Escm_Processtype@ ) or value in (select case when encmethod_auto='Y' then 'A' when encmethod_manual='Y' then 'M' else 'A' end from efin_enc_control where enc_type ='PRE' and pr_type_list=@EM_Escm_Processtype@ ) or value in ( select case when count(*) > 0 then '' else 'A' end from efin_enc_control where enc_type ='PRE' and pr_type_list=@EM_Escm_Processtype@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Budget_Manencum_Funds
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Budget_Manencum.c_campaign_id in (select c_campaign.c_campaign_id from c_campaign where c_campaign.value='02') and Efin_Budget_Manencum.efin_budgetint_id in (select efin_budgetint.efin_budgetint_id from efin_budgetint where efin_budgetint.c_year_id=@C_Year_ID@) and exists (select efin_budget_manencum_id from efin_budget_manencum A where efin_budget_manencum_id not in( select line.efin_budget_manencum_id from efin_bud_manencum_rev rev join efin_budget_manencumlines line on line.efin_budget_manencumlines_id = rev.src_manencumline_id ))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Mawarid_Accounts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_ElementValue.em_efin_classification='Mawarid' and case when @Chapter_ID@ = '1' then C_ElementValue.value like '21%' when @Chapter_ID@ = '2' then( C_ElementValue.value like '22%' or C_ElementValue.value like '23%' or C_ElementValue.value like '24%' or C_ElementValue.value like '25%' or C_ElementValue.value like '26%' or C_ElementValue.value like '27%' or C_ElementValue.value like '28%' ) when @Chapter_ID@ = '3' then C_ElementValue.value like '3%' when @Chapter_ID@ = '4' then C_ElementValue.value like '4%' else ( C_ElementValue.value like '21%' or C_ElementValue.value like '22%' or C_ElementValue.value like '23%' or C_ElementValue.value like '24%' or C_ElementValue.value like '25%' or C_ElementValue.value like '26%' or C_ElementValue.value like '27%' or C_ElementValue.value like '28%' or C_ElementValue.value like '3%' or C_ElementValue.value like '4%' ) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_paymentseq_account
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Bank_ID = @Efin_Bank_ID@ or efin_bank_branch_id in (select efin_bank_branch_id from efin_bank_branch where efin_bank_id = @Efin_Bank_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_RDV_Sorting_Transaction_type
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: RDV Numbers display based on transaction type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_rdv.txn_type=@TXN_Type@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Budget_Status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('OP','REW','APP','INAPP')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Listing Agency Org
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_ehcm_orgtyp in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value='ORG')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_ActiveAccounts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: IsActive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_FundsReqFrmAccountVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EM_Efin_Uniquecode is not null and c_campaign_id = @c_campaign_id@ and ((@Trxtype@='ORGR' and ((@REQ_Type@='REL' and ad_org_id = @Transaction_Org@) or(@REQ_Type@='DIST' and c_salesregion_id in (select hq_budgetcontrolunit from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id =@AD_Client_ID@)))) or ( @Trxtype@='BCUR' and 1=1)) and ((@Trxtype@='BCUR' and c_salesregion_id in ( select case when @REQ_Type@='DIST' Then unnest(('{'||hq_budgetcontrolunit||','||budgetcontrol_costcenter||'}') :: character varying[]) else budgetcontrol_costcenter end from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id =@AD_Client_ID@ )) or ((@Trxtype@='ORGR') and c_salesregion_id = (select case when @REQ_Type@='REL' then budgetcontrol_costcenter else hq_budgetcontrolunit end from efin_budget_ctrl_param where ad_client_id =@AD_Client_ID@)) or (c_validcombination_id=@Fromaccount@)) and ((c_validcombination_id not in (select fromaccount from efin_fundsreqline where fromaccount is not null and efin_fundsreq_id=@Efin_Fundsreq_ID@)) or (c_validcombination_id=@Fromaccount@)) and c_validcombination_id in (select ln.c_validcombination_id from efin_budgetlines ln join efin_budget bug on bug.efin_budget_id= ln.efin_budget_id where c_year_id=@C_Year_ID@ and bug.c_campaign_id = @c_campaign_id@ and bug.status='APP' and bug.ad_client_id =@AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: efin_location_code
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_lookup_type_id IN (SELECT efin_lookup_type_id FROM efin_lookup_type WHERE reference = 'LC' AND Isactive = 'Y') AND Isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: nonexp_project
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Project.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ or C_Project.em_efin_isdefault='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget Hold Contract List
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_c_order_v_id in ( select c_order_id from c_order where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and EM_Escm_Appstatus ='ESCM_AP' and issotrx='N' and docstatus='CO' and em_escm_revision = (select max(a.em_escm_revision) from c_order a where c_order.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and a.documentno = c_order.documentno) and EM_Escm_Ordertype <> 'PUR_AG' and ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@) and escm_c_order_v.escm_c_order_v_id in (select o.c_order_id from c_order o where ((o.EM_Escm_Contact_Type is not null and o.EM_Escm_Contact_Type in ( select look.ESCM_DefLookups_TypeLn_id from Eut_Lookup_Access look where look.ad_role_id =@#AD_ROLE_ID@ and look.isactive='Y')) or(o.EM_Escm_Contact_Type is null ))) and escm_c_order_v.escm_c_order_v_id in ( select o1.c_order_id from c_order o1 where ((o1.EM_Escm_C_City_ID is not null and ((o1.EM_Escm_C_City_ID in ( select eut_c_city_id from eut_regandcity_access cityacc where cityacc.ad_role_id =@#AD_ROLE_ID@ and cityacc.eut_c_city_id is not null )) or (o1.EM_Escm_C_City_ID in (select c_city_id from c_city where c_region_id in ( select eut_c_region_id from eut_regandcity_access cityacc1 where cityacc1.ad_role_id =@#AD_ROLE_ID@ and cityacc1.eut_c_city_id is null ) )))) or (o1.EM_Escm_C_City_ID is null )) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BudgetType_Line
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Campaign_ID = (select C_Campaign_ID from Efin_Budget where Efin_Budget_ID = @Efin_Budget_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sadad Default Pricelist
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: m_pricelist_id in ( select m_pricelist_id from m_pricelist where issopricelist = 'Y' )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_PayOut_SupBank
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_bank_id in ( select em_efin_bank_id from c_bp_bankaccount where c_bpartner_id = (case when @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ when @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ else @C_Bpartner_ID@ end ) and BankFormat=@EM_Efin_Payinst@) and (case when @EM_Efin_Payinst@='IBAN' then ( efin_bank_id in ( select em_efin_bank_id from c_bp_bankaccount where c_bpartner_id = (case when @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ when @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ else @C_Bpartner_ID@ end ))) else efin_bank_id in(select em_efin_bank_id from c_bp_bankaccount where c_bpartner_id = (case when @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ when @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ else @C_Bpartner_ID@ end ) ) end)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org(* only)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id = '0'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Payment_Beneficiary
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (C_Bpartner.C_Bpartner_ID in (select c_bpartner_id from c_invoiceline inv join fin_payment_schedule sch on sch.c_invoice_id=inv.c_invoice_id and inv.c_bpartner_id = sch.em_efin_bpartner_id where inv.c_invoice_id = @EM_Efin_Invoice_ID@ and sch.outstandingamt > 0)) or( ( @EM_Efin_Invoice_ID@ is NULL) and (C_Bpartner.C_Bpartner_ID in (select em_efin_bpartner_id from c_invoice inv left join fin_payment_schedule sch on sch.c_invoice_id=inv.c_invoice_id and sch.outstandingamt > 0 where inv.c_bpartner_id=@C_Bpartner_ID@ and C_Bpartner.C_Bpartner_ID <> @C_Bpartner_ID@ )))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Chapters_Only
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_elementvalue.value in ('1','2','3','4')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: IBAN based on BPartner
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bpartner_id = @C_BPartner_ID@ and Iban is not null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Listing successor invoice
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bpartner_id = @C_BPartner_ID@ and em_efin_distribution_id = @EM_Efin_Distribution_ID@ and EM_Efin_Advancecategory = 'INI' and @C_Invoice_ID@ is not null and c_invoice_id <> @C_Invoice_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRuleAccount
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Securityactpick_V.Efin_Securityactpick_V_ID not in ( select C_Elementvalue_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Act a join Efin_Security_Rules b on b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID join Efin_Security_Ruleslines c on c.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID where a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@ and c.type=@Type@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: User1_AccountDim
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='E' and user1.user1_id = (select em_efin_user1 from c_acctschema_element where elementtype ='U1' and ad_client_id= @AD_Client_ID@) ) or((@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='A') ) and user1.isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRuleSubAccount
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_securityprojpick_v.efin_securityprojpick_v_ID not in ( select c_project_id from Efin_Security_Rules_Proj a join Efin_Security_Rules b on b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID join Efin_Security_Rulesproj c on c.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID where a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@ and c.type=@Type@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_Org_Without_Parent
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_orgtype_id <>'0' and em_ehcm_orgtyp in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value ='ORG')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Project(Subaccounts)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='E' and C_Project_id = (select em_efin_project_id from c_elementvalue where c_elementvalue_id =@Account_ID@) ) or ((@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='A') and C_Project_id = (select c_project_id from c_acctschema_element where elementtype ='PJ' and ad_client_id= @AD_Client_ID@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Customer_Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_lookup_line_id in ( select efin_lookup_line_id from efin_lookup_line where efin_lookup_type_id in ( select efin_lookup_type_id from efin_lookup_type where reference = 'CTYPE')) and (enddate is null or enddate::date >= now()::date)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Valid_Combination(Control Param)
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: valid account combination based on budget control parameters
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Validcombination.C_SalesRegion_ID=@Efin_Aux_Control_Unit@ and C_Validcombination.AD_Org_ID=@Efin_Aux_Agency_Org@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRuleBudgetType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID not in ( select c_campaign_id from Efin_Security_Rules_Budtype a join Efin_Security_Rules b on b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID join Efin_Security_Rulesbudg c on c.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID where a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@ and c.type=@Type@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Org_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Organization list based on the core Organization typ, for which the transaction allowed is yes and organization is ready.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Org_ID in (SELECT o.ad_org_id FROM ad_org o JOIN ad_orgtype ot ON o.ad_orgtype_id=ot.ad_orgtype_id WHERE isready ='Y' AND istransactionsallowed='Y' OR o.ad_org_id='0')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRuleFunctionalClassification
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Activity.C_Activity_ID not in ( select c_activity_id from Efin_Security_Rules_Activ a join Efin_Security_Rules b on b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID join Efin_Security_Rulesactiv c on c.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=b.Efin_Security_Rules_ID where a.Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@ and c.type=@Type@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: output_only_pdf
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value NOT IN ('html','xls')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRule_Fut2Dimension
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: User2.User2_ID not in ( select User2_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Fut2 where Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Invoice Secondary Beneficiary
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when (select em_efin_istax from c_invoice where c_invoice_id =@C_INVOICE_ID@) = 'N' then c_bpartner.c_bpartner_id not in( select c_bpartner_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id =@C_INVOICE_ID@) else true end and c_bpartner.c_bpartner_id <> @C_BPartner_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Output Format: only for Excel
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value NOT IN ('pdf')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_RDV_Penalty_St
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: value not in ('DR')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Parent Sequene
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_payment_sequences_id = @EM_Efin_Payment_Sequences_ID@ and efin_parent_sequence_id in (select par.efin_parent_sequence_id from efin_parent_sequence par join efin_payment_sequences pay on pay.efin_payment_sequences_id=par.efin_payment_sequences_id join efin_child_sequence child on par.efin_parent_sequence_id=child.efin_parent_sequence_id where pay.efin_payment_sequences_id=@EM_Efin_Payment_Sequences_ID@ and child.ad_user_id=@#AD_User_ID@ and (child.fin_to>=child.next_sequence or child.efin_child_sequence_id in (select child.efin_child_sequence_id from efin_return_sequence rtn where rtn.efin_child_sequence_id=child.efin_child_sequence_id)))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Encumbranceyearvalidation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_budgetint_id in (select efin_budgetint_id from efin_budgetint where c_year_id =@year@) and c_campaign_id in (select c_campaign_id from c_campaign where em_efin_budgettype ='C') and docstatus='CO' and Encum_Type !='TE'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Chapter validation on Exp & Non-Exp Report
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Chapter validation on Exp & Non-Exp Report
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: @acctType@ ='EXP'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_ToAccount_ChapterVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.c_elementvalue_id in (select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getchildacct(@Chapter_ID@) ,',')::character varying [] ) ,'''','')) and C_Elementvalue.ad_client_id = @#ad_client_id@ and case when @C_Element_Id_From@ != '' then C_Elementvalue.value >= (select value from c_elementvalue where c_elementvalue_id = @C_Element_Id_From@) else 1=1 end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ManualEncumbranceAccounts(LInes)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.C_Elementvalue_ID in(select act.c_elementvalue_id from efin_security_rules_act act join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id= act.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@#AD_Role_ID@)) and C_Elementvalue.elementlevel='S'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_MANU_DOC
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (AD_Ref_List.value NOT IN ('IE') ) or value=(select case when( Isauto='Y') then 'IE' else '' end from Efin_Budget_Manencum where Efin_Budget_Manencum_ID=@Efin_Budget_Manencum_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_BudgetType_Funds
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID in (select bt.C_Campaign_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Budtype bt join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=bt.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@) and bt.C_Campaign_ID in (select C_Campaign_ID from C_Campaign where ad_client_id =@AD_Client_ID@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BP Bank selector
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_cbpbankaccount_v_id in ( select c_bp_bankaccount_id from c_bp_bankaccount where c_bpartner_id = (case when @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ when @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ else @C_Bpartner_ID@ end ) and BankFormat=@EM_Efin_Payinst@) and (case when @EM_Efin_Payinst@='IBAN' then ( Efin_cbpbankaccount_v_id in ( select c_bp_bankaccount_id from c_bp_bankaccount where c_bpartner_id = case when @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ when @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ else @C_Bpartner_ID@ end ) ) else Efin_cbpbankaccount_v_id in(select c_bp_bankaccount_id from c_bp_bankaccount where c_bpartner_id = (case when @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Beneficiary2_ID@ when @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ is not null then @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ else @C_Bpartner_ID@ end ) and BankFormat=@EM_Efin_Payinst@) end) and em_efin_bank_id =@EM_Efin_Bank_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Financial account name
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Financial_Account_V_ID in (select fin.FIN_Financial_Account_id from fin_financial_account fin join FIN_FinAcc_PaymentMethod meth on fin.fin_financial_account_id =meth.fin_financial_account_id where meth.FIN_Paymentmethod_ID = @FIN_Paymentmethod_ID@ and fin.em_efin_acct_type = @EM_Efin_Accounttype@ and fin.ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Hold value
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: eut_deflookups_type_id in (select eut_deflookups_type_id from eut_deflookups_type where value ='HOLD_TYPE' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_BudInit_Completed
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_budgetint.status = 'OP' and efin_budgetint.Ispreclose ='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_FundsReq_DistTypeVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((AD_Ref_List.Value in ('DIST','MAN') and @REQ_Type@='DIST' ) or (AD_Ref_List.Value='MAN' and @REQ_Type@='REL'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Payment Out Secondary Beneficiary
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (C_Bpartner.C_Bpartner_ID in (select inv.em_efin_beneficiary2_id from c_invoiceline inv join fin_payment_schedule sch on sch.c_invoice_id=inv.c_invoice_id and inv.em_efin_beneficiary2_id = sch.em_efin_beneficiary2_id where inv.c_invoice_id = @EM_Efin_Invoice_ID@ and inv.C_Bpartner_ID = @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ and sch.outstandingamt > 0)) or( ( @EM_Efin_Invoice_ID@ is NULL) and (C_Bpartner.C_Bpartner_ID in (select em_efin_beneficiary2_id from c_invoice inv left join fin_payment_schedule sch on sch.c_invoice_id=inv.c_invoice_id where sch.em_efin_bpartner_id=@EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ and inv.c_bpartner_id= @C_Bpartner_ID@ and C_Bpartner.C_Bpartner_ID <> @C_Bpartner_ID@ and C_Bpartner.C_Bpartner_ID <> @EM_Efin_Bpartner_ID@ )))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget_user1
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: User1.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ or User1.em_efin_isdefault='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Customer Id Lookup
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Escm_Certificates_ID in ( select Escm_Certificates_ID from ESCM_Certificates where c_bpartner_id = @c_bpartner_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRule_FunClassDimension
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Activity.C_Activity_ID not in ( select C_Activity_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Activ where Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_PUR_ACC
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.c_elementvalue_id IN (select act.c_elementvalue_id from efin_security_rules_act act join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id= act.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@)) and ((@em_efin_encumtype@='N' and accounttype!='E' and issummary!='Y') or (@em_efin_encumtype@='A' and accounttype ='E' and issummary!='Y'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Listing Asset account
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_ElementValue.accounttype='A'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Org_Val(without *)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Org_ID in (SELECT o.ad_org_id FROM ad_org o JOIN ad_orgtype ot ON o.ad_orgtype_id=ot.ad_orgtype_id WHERE isready ='Y' AND istransactionsallowed='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_PUR_USER2
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: User2.User2_ID in (select fut.User2_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Fut2 fut join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=fut.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@)) and ( case when ( select ru.efin_processbutton from efin_security_rules ru where ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@))='Y' then ( User2.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ or User2.em_efin_isdefault='Y') else User2.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ end )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Invoiceline org
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Org_ID = (select ad_org_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = @c_invoice_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_FinancialYear_AccountTree
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_year_id in (select y.c_year_id from c_period p join c_year y on y.c_year_id = p.c_year_id where now()::date between p.startdate and p.enddate and p.ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_PUR_PRO
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Project.C_Project_ID in (select bt.C_Project_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Proj bt join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=bt.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BusinessPartner(account dimensions)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@EM_Efin_Accounttype@='E' and c_bpartner.c_bpartner_id =(select c_bpartner_id from c_acctschema_element where elementtype ='BP' and ad_client_id= @AD_Client_ID@) ) or((@EM_Efin_Accounttype@='A') ) and c_bpartner.isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Month Sequence Of Selected Year
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Period.C_Year_ID IN (SELECT C_Year_ID FROM Efin_Year_Sequence WHERE Efin_Year_Sequence_ID = @Efin_Year_Sequence_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Listing validation of Budget Definition in FRM
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_budgetint.status = 'OP' and efin_budgetint.Ispreclose ='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRule_ProjectDimension
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Securityprojpick_V.Efin_Securityprojpick_V_ID not in ( select C_Project_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Proj where Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_bud_manencum_rev_status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('APP')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: User2_Acc_Dim
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='E' and user2.user2_id =(select em_efin_user2 from c_acctschema_element where elementtype ='U2' and ad_client_id= @AD_Client_ID@) ) or((@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='A') ) and user2.isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sadad Defaults Bank
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Financial_Account_V_ID in (select fin.FIN_Financial_Account_id from fin_financial_account fin join FIN_FinAcc_PaymentMethod meth on fin.fin_financial_account_id =meth.fin_financial_account_id where meth.FIN_Paymentmethod_ID = @FIN_Paymentmethod_ID@ and fin.em_efin_acct_type = @Accounttype@ and fin.ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Listing Encumbrances in BR
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sourceref_id = @Efin_Budget_Transfertrx_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_MumtalakatProj
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_lookup_type_id in ( select efin_lookup_type_id from efin_lookup_type where reference ='MTLKTPJ' and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Customer Type Lookup
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_lookup_line_id = ( select EM_Efin_customer_type from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = @c_bpartner_id@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BudgetType_Acct
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.C_Elementvalue_ID in ( select ev.c_elementvalue_id from c_elementvalue as ev where issummary ='Y' and isactive='Y' and em_efin_allow_budgeting='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Based On Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@ ='E' and c_elementvalue.accounttype = @EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@) or (@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@ <>'E' and c_elementvalue.accounttype <> 'E') ) and C_ElementValue.isactive ='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Expense account based in encumbrance
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_efin_dimensiontype='E' and c_validcombination_id in( select c_validcombination_id from efin_budget_manencumlines where efin_budget_manencum_id=@EM_Efin_Manualencumbrance_ID@) or (@EM_Efin_Manualencumbrance_ID@ is null and 1=1)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Budget_Line(DisOrgValid)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id in (select ad_org_id from c_validcombination where c_salesregion_id = @EFIN_Aux_BudControl_CostCenter@ and account_id = @C_Elementvalue_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: efin payment instr validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.ad_reference_id in( select ad_reference_id from AD_Reference where name = 'EFIN_Payment_Instruction_List')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_emp_status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('ACT','INACT')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Securityrule_DeptDimension
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Securitydeptpick_V.efin_securitydeptpick_v_id not in ( select C_Salesregion_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Dept where Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_PO_Encum_List
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((docstatus = 'CO' and encum_type = 'POE' and encum_method='M' and amount <> app_amt and efin_budgetint_id = @EM_Efin_Budgetint_ID@ and case when c_bpartner_id is not null then c_bpartner_id = @C_BPartner_ID@ else 1 = 1 end ) or ( Efin_Budget_Manencum_ID= @EM_Efin_Budget_Manencum_ID@ and c_bpartner_id = @C_BPartner_ID@ ))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Nonexp _Dept
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_salesregion_id not in( select c_salesregion_id from c_salesregion where em_efin_transactiondep = 'N' and ad_org_id='0') and C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID in (select dep.C_Salesregion_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Dept dep join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=dep.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@ ))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_RDV_Iban
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bp_bankaccount_id = @C_Bp_Bankaccount_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_SecurityRule_BudtypeDimension
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID not in ( select C_Campaign_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Budtype where Efin_Security_Rules_ID=@Efin_Security_Rules_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FunctionalClassification_Dim
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='E' and c_activity.c_activity_id =(select c_activity_id from c_acctschema_element where elementtype ='AY' and ad_client_id= @AD_Client_ID@) ) or((@EM_Efin_Dimensiontype@='A') ) and c_activity.isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Budget_Account
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.accounttype = 'E' and C_Elementvalue.elementlevel = 'S'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Bpartner_Isemployee
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner.isEmployee='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_Account_Expense
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_elementvalue.accounttype='E' and c_elementvalue.isactive='Y' and c_elementvalue.issummary='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_FromSubAccount_BasedonChapter
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.c_elementvalue_id in(select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getchildacct(@C_Elementvalue_ID@) ,',')::character varying [] ) ,'''','')) and C_Elementvalue.ad_client_id = @#ad_client_id@ and C_Elementvalue.elementlevel = 'S' and case when @to_c_project@ != '' then C_Elementvalue.value <= (select value from c_elementvalue where c_elementvalue_id = @to_c_project@) else 1=1 end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_User1_SecurityRule
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: User1.User1_ID in (select fut.User1_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Fut1 fut join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=fut.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_PUR_DEP
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Salesregion.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ and C_salesregion.isdefault!='Y' and C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID in (select dep.C_Salesregion_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Dept dep join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=dep.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Order to Receive Service Item
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when (select serviceitemsecurity from efin_sadadbill_config where ad_client_id = @ad_client_id@) = 'Y' then Efin_Serviceitem_Config_ID in ( select Efin_Serviceitem_Config_ID from efin_serviceitem_config where c_elementvalue_id = @EM_Efin_Elementvalue_ID@ and applicationtype = @EM_Efin_Applicationtype@ and dept_auth_code = @EM_Efin_Deptauthcode@ and dept_benefit_code = @EM_Efin_Deptbenefitcode@ and isActive = 'Y' ) else Efin_Serviceitem_Config_ID in ( select Efin_Serviceitem_Config_ID from efin_serviceitem_config where isActive = 'Y' ) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Encum_Manual
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: value in ('M') or ( @Efin_Budget_Manencum_ID@ is not null and value=@Encum_Method@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_po_approval_status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('SUB','APP','ASSREW','CA','REACT')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Budgetline_Status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('SCS','FL')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget_Department
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (C_Salesregion.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ and C_Salesregion.C_Salesregion_ID in (select C_Salesregion_id from C_Salesregion where isdefault ='Y') ) or C_Salesregion.isdefault='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Rdv_BPBank
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bp_bankaccount_id in (select c_bp_bankaccount_id from c_bp_bankaccount where c_bpartner_id = @C_Bpartner_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_EncumbranceType_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: @EFIN_MaintainEncum_Control@='MEC' and AD_Ref_List.Value not in ('BE','MO')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Invoice_encumtype
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('AEE','AAE','POE')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_PO_Encum_Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: docstatus = 'CO' and encum_type = 'PRE' and encum_method='M' and ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@ and amount <> app_amt and efin_budgetint_id = @EM_Efin_Budgetint_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Rdv_ShipAddress
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Bpartner_Location.c_bpartner_id = @C_Bpartner_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Year Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_year_id in (select y.c_year_id from c_period p join c_year y on y.c_year_id = p.c_year_id where now()::date between p.startdate and p.enddate and p.ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_ChapterValidation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_ElementValue.Issummary='N' and C_ElementValue.elementlevel='S' AND case when @chapter_id@ ='1' then C_ElementValue.value like '21%' when @chapter_id@ ='2' then C_ElementValue.value like '22%' when @chapter_id@ ='3' then C_ElementValue.value like '3%' when @chapter_id@ ='4' then C_ElementValue.value like '4%' else C_ElementValue.value like '%' END

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Annual_Static_Value
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: value in ('ANU')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_PUR_FUNC
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Activity.C_Activity_ID in (select act.C_Activity_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Activ act join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=act.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@)) and ( case when ( select ru.efin_processbutton from efin_security_rules ru where ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@))='Y' then ( C_Activity.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ or C_Activity.em_efin_isdefault='Y') else C_Activity.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ end )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget_revision_type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (AD_Ref_List.value NOT IN ('originalbudget') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Child Organization
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_ISORGINCLUDED(ad_org.ad_org_id, CASE WHEN (@Parent_AD_Org@ IS NULL OR @Parent_AD_Org@ = '') THEN @AD_ORG_ID@ ELSE @Parent_AD_Org@ END, ad_org.ad_client_id)<>-1 AND IsReady='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Transaction type original budget adjustment
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@Isoriginal@='OBA' and AD_Ref_List.value='OBA') or (@Revision@='BR' and AD_Ref_List.value not in ('OBA') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_InvoiceDoctype
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('ARI', 'API','ARC','APC','ARI_RM') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') and ((C_DocType.C_DocType_id not in (select c_doctype_id from c_doctype where em_efin_isrdvinv ='Y')) or (C_DocType.C_DocType_id = @C_DocTypeTarget_ID@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BudgetLine Account
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.C_Elementvalue_ID in( (select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getchildacct ((select C_Elementvalue_ID from efin_budget bug where bug.efin_budget_id=@Efin_Budget_ID@)) ,',')::character varying [] ) ,'''',''))) and C_Elementvalue.elementlevel='S' and C_Elementvalue.IsActive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Activity_SecurityRule
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Activity.C_Activity_ID in (select act.C_Activity_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Activ act join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=act.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_RDV_PO_List
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_efin_budgetint_id = @Efin_Budgetint_ID@ and (c_order_id not in (select c_order_id from m_inout where m_inout_id in (select m_inout_id from efin_rdv where ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and m_inout_id is not null) and c_order_id is not null ) and c_order_id not in (select c_order_id from efin_rdv where ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@ and c_order_id is not null) or c_order_id = @C_Order_ID@) and c_order_id in (select c_order_id from c_order where dateordered <= (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@TXN_Date@)))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_FINANCIAL_PERIOD
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Period.C_Year_ID=@C_Year_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_Branch_List
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @EM_Efin_Bank_ID@ is not null then Efin_Bank_Branch.efin_bank_id =@EM_Efin_Bank_ID@ end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Payment Sequence
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: fin_financial_account_id=@Fin_Financial_Account_ID@ and fin_paymentmethod_id = @fin_paymentmethod_id@ and ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_CostCentersDept
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Salesregion_id in (select C_Salesregion_id from C_Salesregion dept where ad_org_id= @Org@) or (C_Salesregion_id = (SELECT budgetcontrol_costcenter from Efin_Budget_Ctrl_Param where ad_client_id = @ad_client_id@)) or(C_Salesregion_id = (SELECT HQ_Budgetcontrolunit from Efin_Budget_Ctrl_Param where ad_client_id = @ad_client_id@) and @org@= (SELECT agency_hq_org from Efin_Budget_Ctrl_Param where ad_client_id = @ad_client_id@) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_ChapterValidation_ParentCode
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @Chapter_ID@ = '1' then C_ElementValue.value like '21%' when @Chapter_ID@ = '2' then( C_ElementValue.value like '22%' or C_ElementValue.value like '23%' or C_ElementValue.value like '24%' or C_ElementValue.value like '25%' or C_ElementValue.value like '26%' or C_ElementValue.value like '27%' or C_ElementValue.value like '28%' ) when @Chapter_ID@ = '3' then ( C_ElementValue.value like '30%' or C_ElementValue.value like '36%' or C_ElementValue.value like '37%') when @Chapter_ID@ = '4' then C_ElementValue.value like '4%' else ( C_ElementValue.value like '21%' or C_ElementValue.value like '22%' or C_ElementValue.value like '23%' or C_ElementValue.value like '24%' or C_ElementValue.value like '25%' or C_ElementValue.value like '26%' or C_ElementValue.value like '27%' or C_ElementValue.value like '28%' or C_ElementValue.value like '30%' or C_ElementValue.value like '36%' or C_ElementValue.value like '37%' or C_ElementValue.value like '4%' ) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_FromAccount_ChapterVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.c_elementvalue_id in (select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getchildacct(@Chapter_ID@) ,',')::character varying [] ) ,'''','')) and C_Elementvalue.ad_client_id = @#ad_client_id@ and case when @C_Element_Id_To@ != '' then C_Elementvalue.value <= (select value from c_elementvalue where c_elementvalue_id = @C_Element_Id_To@) else 1=1 end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_securityRule_Processed
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Security_Rules.Efin_Processbutton='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_ChaperNo
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.C_Elementvalue_ID in(select line.C_Elementvalue_ID from efin_budgettype_acct line join C_Campaign on C_Campaign.C_Campaign_ID= line.C_Campaign_ID left join C_Acctschema_element ase on ase.C_Acctschema_id = C_Campaign.em_efin_c_acctschema_id and ase.elementtype='AC' where ase.isactive='Y' and C_Campaign.ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@) and C_Elementvalue.issummary='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EFIN_NonBudgetAccount_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Elementvalue.C_Elementvalue_ID not in (select replace(unnest(string_to_array( eut_getallallowbugact(@AD_Client_ID@),',')::character varying []),'''','')) and elementlevel='S'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_Budget_Manencum_Cost
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Budget_Manencum.c_campaign_id in (select c_campaign.c_campaign_id from c_campaign where c_campaign.value='01') and Efin_Budget_Manencum.Docstatus not in ('CA','DR','RW') and Efin_Budget_Manencum.efin_budgetint_id in (select efin_budgetint.efin_budgetint_id from efin_budgetint where efin_budgetint.c_year_id=@C_Year_ID@) and Efin_Budget_Manencum.efin_budget_manencum_id not in( select line.efin_budget_manencum_id from efin_bud_manencum_rev rev join efin_budget_manencumlines line on line.efin_budget_manencumlines_id = rev.src_manencumline_id )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_ManualEncumLinesProject
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Project.C_Project_ID in (select bt.C_Project_ID from Efin_Security_Rules_Proj bt join efin_security_rules ru on ru.efin_security_rules_id=bt.efin_security_rules_id where ru.efin_processbutton ='Y' and ru.efin_security_rules_id=(select em_efin_security_rules_id from ad_role where ad_role_id=@AD_Role_Id@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_year Of Organization
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Year.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Efin_CostCenterDescriptors
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: efin_lookup_type_id in ( select efin_lookup_type_id from efin_lookup_type where reference ='CCD')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DocTypeValidation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('MMR') and C_DocType.IsReturn='N'
